live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
52482.summary: Some customers in the Heritage Lakes area of St. Albert are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52482.title: Aug 12 - St. Albert (Heritage Lakes) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
